InformativeText.Abstract: Data structure containing the limits between the heart rate zones for the 3-zone heart rate definition (Hard, Moderate and Light).

Field.name: Three zone Heart Rate Limits - Light (Fat burn) / Moderate (Aerobic) Limit
Field.InformativeText: Unit is in beats per minute with a resolution of 1

Field.name: Three zone Heart Rate Limits - Moderate (Aerobic) / Hard (Anaerobic) Limit
Field.InformativeText: Unit is in beats per minute with a resolution of 1

Note.p: The fields in the above table are in the order of LSO to MSO. Where LSO = Least Significant Octet and MSO = Most Significant Octet.
